main event: A round white object giving off a silver-dollar sized light was observed for about 10 seconds at an altitude of approximately 30,000 feet.
interesting points: The object was in sight rapidly approaching and then disappearing quickly,The observation occurred near Aiea, Oahu, on 12/12/52,The sighting lasted for 5 minutes,The observer reported the object showed characteristics similar to a balloon or aircraft,The conclusion of the sighting included possible balloon involvement.
sighted object: a round white object emitting light
